events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it doesn't fit. I would like to request a refund for this item as soon as possible.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to an unsatisfactory product fit. The cluster is set to Refund.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want a refund for the jacket that doesn’t fit. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirmation that the item has been shipped back to us for processing the refund?
My order number is 87654321. I dropped the jacket off at the post office two days ago, so it should be on its way back to you.
Thank you for the details. Once we receive the jacket, we will process your refund immediately and notify you by email.
That sounds good, thanks! I appreciate the quick response and the clear refund procedure you provided.
We have received the returned jacket and successfully processed your refund. Please check your bank statement for confirmation.
Just checking in to ensure that your refund was received and that you are satisfied with how we handled your case.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us and please let us know if you need further assistance.
